quizlist.question: What will happen when there is an excessive wear on a centrifugal pump shaft?
quizlist.option1: There will be an excessive leakage past the packing gland
quizlist.option3: The pump bearings will be damage

quizlist.question: What is used as a jointing materials for fresh and sea water pipes?
In hydraulic system, all machines which are consumers of hydraulic power equipped with ________.?
4/3 Way valve is a type of directional valve with ___________ .?
The following are parts of the main bowl of purifier except___________.?
A hydraulic system where all oil goes back to the tank is termed as____________.?
Return port of a hydraulic directional valve is designated by letter __________.?
After installing a new hydraulic pump in a system, what special attention should be given to the hydraulic system?
quizlist.option1: The filters and strainers should be checked frequently.
quizlist.option2: The relief valves in the system should be readjusted.
quizlist.option3: All system pressure should be readjusted.

quizlist.question: What should be done if localized scoring is discovered on the pump shaft sleeve during routine maintenance inspection?
quizlist.option1: Correct the cause of scoring and install a new shaft sleeve.
quizlist.option2: Reassemble the pump and provide more water leak off for lubrication.
quizlist.option3: Check for parallel alignment of the sleeve radial face to the sleeve bore.

quizlist.question: What will be the result of badly leaking refrigeration compressor discharge valves?
The nut of the bowl assembly is confirmed tight___________.?
quizlist.option1: when marks on the body and nut are aligned
quizlist.option3: when the nut is no longer move after several hammer blows

quizlist.question: What factors shorten the life of valve springs?
An aligning punch is used to_______________.?
quizlist.option1: line up corresponding holes in adjacent parts
quizlist.option3: mark centers and lines in layout work

quizlist.question: A fixed displacement pump is a hydraulic pump in which the________.?

Which of the following will speed up the recovery process when performing maintenance on a refrigeration system _______?
quizlist.option1: chilling the recovery vessel and heating the appliance

quizlist.question: One of the four basic components of hydraulic system that provides the flow of oil in the system is called__________.?
Most common type of hydraulic pump is _____.?
The size of flexible hose used in a hydraulic system is indicated by______________.?
quizlist.option1: the numerical designation found on the 'skin' of the hose
quizlist.option2: the thickness of the tube wall
quizlist.option3: the inside diameter of the tube

quizlist.option1: The filters and strainers should be checked frequently.

quizlist.option1: the numerical designation found on the 'skin' of the hose

quizlist.question: Before carrying-out maintenance to the engine, one should __________.?

quizlist.option3: to be disposed after second use

quizlist.question: Improper maintenance of fuel oil burner in an auxiliary boiler could result to ________.?

quizlist.option1: Ensuring that the thermal bulb is in good contact with the suction line.
